comment._content: Miss Edison, daughter of Thomas A. Edison, the inventor, is to be the wife of an inventor, John Eyre Sloane, son of Dr. and Mrs. T. 0'Conor Sloane of South ... Source: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DE4DF1730E233A... I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Eyre_Sloane
